instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00850 dead
threads.message:
checking without battery i have:
PPBUS_G3H 12.28 V
PP5V_G3S 0.033 V
P5VG3S_EN 0.0 V
PP3V3_G3H_RTC 3.3 V
PP3V3_G3H 3.3 V
PP3V3_S4SW_SNS 0.0
PP3V3_G3S 0.0
P3V3G3S_EN 0.0
And I have all PMU LDO'S,then I tried to restore it with apple configurator 2 it gives this error:The operation couldn't be completed. (AMRestoreErrorDomain error -1- Failed to handle message type StatusMsg (Generic error)) [AMRestoreErrorDomain -OxFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF (-1) [sys= 0x3F, sub= 0xFFF, code = 0x3FFF (16383)]]

threads.title: 820-00850 dead
threads.message:
Error 1 may be related with missing battery.
So connect good battery and try again.

threads.title: 820-00850 dead
threads.message:
Does this battery hold some charge?
Are you using original 87W charger?

threads.title: 820-00850 dead
threads.message: Yes the battery has charge and am using 87W charger

threads.title: 820-00850 dead
threads.message: Compare diode mode readings on G3S power rails and SSD coils with good board.
